name: Mahjong Worlds Premium
description:
Mahjong Worlds is a modern-day tribute to the classic Chinese Solitaire game.
Our take on this timeless classic brings you a whole new Mah-Jongg Shanghai Experience that can be tailored to anyone's key with 20 themed tile sets and diverse worlds.

Take a trip in time to the Ice Age. Visit the Fairy Tales world or stay real and go on a journey to Madagascar or Serengeti.

The goal is simple - match open pairs of identical tiles to clear the board as quickly as possible. A tile is active when there are no obstacles on both of its sides. Only then it can be paired and removed to unveil what's underneath it or to unblock a neighboring piece. Mix and match your way through each world as quickly as you can to unlock and conquer the next one. This ancient Kyodai game has been stimulating people's brains and testing their logic and sequential thinking for ages.

So give it a try and see if you have what it gets. Mahjong Solitaire is a perfect exercise for keeping your brain sharp and snappy.

Features:
· 20 Themed Worlds
· 17 Custom Tile Sets
· 300 Unique Levels
Themed Music and Sound Effects for every World
